title: Bootstrap tries to use stage0 Cargo with local Rust/Cargo in config.toml

labels.name: T-bootstrap
labels.description: Relevant to the bootstrap subteam: Rust's build system (x.py and src/bootstrap)

body:
In `config.toml` (I'm on Windows):

```toml
[build]
cargo = "C:/Users/my_user/.cargo/bin/cargo"
rustc = "C:/Users/my_user/.cargo/bin/rustc"
```
